title: Terai Himalayas Jungle Stay in Uttar Pradesh with All-Inclusive Daily Dining & Lodge Credit
description:
Escape to Jaagir Lodge Dudhwa - AM Hotel Kollection and experience a memorable stay within the Terai Himalayas of Uttar Pradesh. Travel eight hours by road from Delhi and four hours from Lucknow to reach this gorgeous colonial-style lodge where luxury rooms and suites have stood the test of time since the 1940s, and today, each one has been elevated to include contemporary amenities. The neighbouring forest reserves invite you to explore the wonders of the jungle and the chance to witness 38 species of mammals and over 500 exotic bird species.

Endless fun beckons during your stay here. You can choose to go on a safari and marvel at the jungle cats (surcharges apply), dive into the pool as you listen to the call of the wild, sit in the gorgeous Library Lounge & Bar with a good book or be entertained with a variety of board games. If you want to add to the fun then you can enjoy a Game Drive in any of the four jungles (extra charges apply). Epicurean delights are within easy reach as the chefs work hard at creating tasty dishes that cater for all styles. With every comfort taken care of, the hospitality team will not disappoint you thanks to their prompt services.
location_description: Jaagir Lodge Dudhwa - AM Hotel Kollection
offer_address: Bikram Ban Farms, Dist., Lakhimpur Kheri, P.O Bam Nagar, Palia Kalan, Uttar Pradesh 262902, India

title: Peaceful Luxury Boutique in Varanasi
description: Experience the colour and vibrancy of Varanasi, regarded as the ‘spiritual capital of India’ and then retreat to a serene haven of solace each evening at the Tree of Life Varanasi. Spend two nights in a spacious Junior Suite with daily breakfasts, one neck and shoulder massage each, one three-course meal and a cooking class for two adults.
